title: Opinion: Shield bash should be a Keystone
body:
Seems like it would be neat for a Keystone, just adjust the stats accordingly, it could give you a small gap closer like Ekko's e when it activates to make it more keystone-like. Replace bone plating with a tenacity rune or something. (Maybe just move legend: tenacity here and make something else in precision?)

Edit:
Since a lot of people are saying it can't be used by everyone, maybe cut back on increasing the numbers and add a way to get shielding from this keystone. Possibly get a small shield(5% MHP?) when an active item is used?

replies.body: It's way too niche to be a keystone.

> [{quoted}](name=Done25,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AmMHcLET,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-10-26T04:10:31.545+0000)
>
> It's way too niche to be a keystone.

You could say the same thing about guardian, klepto, glacial, etc.
Klepto niche?  What?

> [{quoted}](name=Ralanr,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AmMHcLET,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2018-10-26T04:37:12.260+0000)
>
> Klepto niche?  What?

who really uses it besides EZ/GP and maybe Illaoi. I'd say it's niche.

The difference is that every champion is able to use guardian, klepto, glacial.
But just tanks and bruisers with shields are able to use shield bash.

The only keystone with a similar restriction is aftershock, but hard CC is more common among tanks than a shield.
There are quite some tanks relying on healing or increased tank stats as a tank steroid instead of shields.
{{champion:12}} {{champion:32}} {{champion:201}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:57}} {{champion:33}} {{champion:113}} {{champion:154}} {{champion:89}} 

Meanwhile after Nunus rework, **every** tank in the game has hard CC to trigger Aftershock.

not every tank has hard cc {{champion:36}} .

Allies can shield you as well as items. With locket being an item that shields based off hp literally any tank that builds  hp can use it.

I know, people are sick of this argument, but Dr. Mundo is not a tank. He is a juggernaut, which is a fighter subclass.

And I don't know if it's really worth it to use a rune that just works if you have a specific **completed** item that has 10 times the CD of the rune.

My point on the shield bash is its not just self shields from abilities. If you have a locket it can be used. If you have a janna or karma then it can be used. Its a rune that can literally be used by anyone just like aery. 

Will it be good is a different question but I can see a world where its used for the damage like on any adc with a shielding support. It could even be used with a shiv dusk stormrazor yi with 4 shielders so he can 1 shot champs with 1 q like dark harvest.

Mundo is not a Tank. Same as Nasus or Illaoi or Garen, they don't have hard CC and they are not Tank either.

And well, technically Yorick has a hard CC, but it's so unreliable that you shouldn't count on it either.

Technically everyone can use it, because:

1.) You don't have to cast the shield yourself
2.) There are items that give shields.

You can't use Aery's shield on allies on every champion too.

Relying on allies shielding you to get the benefit is not reliable, tho.

And I doubt that it's worth to take a rune that just function with specific completed items, which have a CD that is 10 times as big as the CD of said rune.
having a lulu or janna as your support is a very reliable way to get the benefit for the adc.
ooof taking resolve tree on an adc

Well, now that you're not forced to take HP with it since stats are independent, it's actually pretty good. Take that + Revitalize with a shielding support and you're unkillable with very little sacrifice in damage.

Well, don't that beat all.

Too bad mordekaiser hates e-girl supports.
Actually, Blitz or Thresh work *better*, but Enchantresses are not strictly bad with Morde either, especially those who have hard CC. Nami or Janna work decently well.

Nah, the problem with e-girls is that mord needs someone w for that dot. Also, engage supps can give him movement speed towards his target. Now I know that some enchantresses can give ms, but they have to use their own abilities to do so. Also, mord doesn't need shield or heals from another source. He provides his own, all he needs is cc and peel.
Nami Jana can stay behind you in range for the W. Once again, I'm not saying they're optimal, there's no denying that Blitz/Leona/etc. are better, I'm just saying they are viable.
Too bad Shield Bash just straight up doesn’t do anything on him.
Meh, not worth it over taking other runes in my opinion. Especially since an adc doesn't build health to increase the damage even further.

eh depends on the damage of the rune, the janna and lulu shields are often much larger than that of most tanks and bruisers with lower cds as well. the most hilarious thing will still be steraks sion popping you for 2k with this rune though.

> [{quoted}](name=SociaI Justice,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AmMHcLET,comment-id=0001000000000001000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-10-26T12:02:06.621+0000)
>
> eh depends on the damage of the rune, the janna and lulu shields are often much larger than that of most tanks and bruisers with lower cds as well. the most hilarious thing will still be steraks sion popping you for 2k with this rune though.

For reference, before the lowered the base damage on it, an ADC with no bonus health at level 18 needed a 717 point shield to hit 100 bonus damage (which was DMP’s damage). Likely need a stronger shield now.
well i'd imagine if it was a keystone the damage would be quite a bit higher.
Nasus, Viktor, Swain, Vlad, Udyr. It's probably viable on Urgot too, if you don't want to bother with all the swapping required with Spellbook.
If it weren't niche why doesn't everyone run it? Why don't I run it on Kat?
Because that's not what "niche" mean? There are 15 Keystones in the game, even if they were each perfectly equally used, that would mean less than 7% for each Keystone.

Klepto is legitimately only used on champs with on-hit abilities....and even then most of them (apart from Ezreal) have alternatives to it, making it only really good in SOME situations, thereby making it a niche choice. Although I will say that's it's core for Ezreal.
That's a more reasonable argument, but that's totally not what you said in your previous post.
I didn't think I'd have to spell it out since we all play the game enough to know who uses what rune and why. But fair enough I suppose.

I enjoy how the title is simply "Opinion.". 

I like this.

Anyone can get a shield due to items and other champs. What about swapping Shield Bash and Aftershock because not everyone can use Aftershock? Remove the damage aspect of Aftershock and make it just a small MR Armour increase when you CC someone, like an engage safety tool. Then add shield bash as a Keystone and amp it up a little.
The gap closer should be more like {{champion:245}} E

We already have the problem of Aery being too similar to Arcane Comet.
Yeah, I really like that idea.

Sounds like a better plan than it being a basic rune.
Can we make this replace guardian? and make guardian a basic rune?

Wait, you mean that thing is not a keystone?

It's too good to not be a keystone, you can literally use it in a ton of different champions without sacrificing anything.

It’s damage is lower than most keystones, even with higher bonus hp and shield strength. Grasp is still better and does more stuff, as do Aftershock and Guardian.
If they ever buffed it enough to be viable as a keystone it wouldn't be a tank rune it would be ADC with Janna support rune or a {{item:3053}} uses rune.

{{item:3800}} {{item:3742}} {{item:2065}} {{item:3152}}

> [{quoted}](name=Anghellous,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AmMHcLET,comment-id=000c00000000,timestamp=2018-10-26T19:22:45.743+0000)
>
> Movespeed != Mobility. IDK a tank that builds protobelt.

Whats stopping Cho from building protobelt? It gives all the stats he likes. Most tanks would still prefer aftershock over this rune anyway.

It's a pittance in terms of HP compared to what he already gets and needs.

If he's building full tank, he needs some more resistances.

If it's damage you want, he already does enough. AP itemization for him is an all or nothing type deal for him (burst targets with your kit or don't even try for that and just build tanky).

It would be interesting if they buffed it and made it a keystone: Shields are X% stronger (on self - no abusing from lulu/janna egurls) with the damage proc it had now. This would include Sterak's and other champ shields on you.

Then, they could replace its slot with a suitably nerfed aftershock with no damage for people who want early resistances.
So even more toxic Urgot and Sion top?

I disagree.
They would have to heavily increase the damage of it to warrant its use over Aftershock. And it is a purely offensive rune, I wouldn't consider this a good keystone for a defensive tree. Every other keystone in Resolve has some defensive added to it. 

Aftershock: Increased tank stats (armor + MR)
Guardian: Shielding you and an ally
Grasp of the Undying: Healing
It is not only offensive. Shield bash also increases remaining shield size by 10%. It depends of course on how much you're focused, but it's still a defensive effect nonetheless.

Did they change it?
Because the last iteration of it I saw was this:
https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-MGlBmQAMRuE/W8-RJjnLQsI/AAAAAAABJcc/swOfCknecwMQ4ZqlHredwhfNNbX4MEQ2QCLcBGAs/s1600/shieldbash.png

And this version says it is purely offensive, no additional shield granted.

EDIT: Ok, looked up the PBE and they really changed it. MB then.
